mapper.insert: insert into temp (pid, uid, state, useful, unuseful, stateUpdateDate) values (#{pid}, #{uid}, #{state}, 0, 0, now())
mapper.select: select * from temp where stateUpdateDate > date_sub(now(), interval '0 00:30:00' day_second) and pid = #{pid}

select tmp.*, coalesce(tU.useful, 0) as myOpt from tempUser tU right join (select * from temp where stateUpdateDate > date_sub(now(), interval '0 00:30:00' day_second) and pid = #{pid} limit 5) tmp on tU.tid = tmp.id and tU.uid = #{uid} order by tmp.id desc
